titleStmt.title: Description of Free Library of Philadelphia, Lewis E M 43:16: Initial B with St. Michael Archangel slaying the dragon
titleStmt.funder: Council on Library and Information Resources

notesStmt.note: This initial begins the Introit for the feast of Michaelmas, or the Dedication of St. Michael the Archangel (Sept. 29), Benedicite Domino omnes angeli ejus ... (Bless the Lord, all you angels of his); Lewis E M 43:15-18 are from the same manuscript.
This image shows the reverse of a cutting with an initial from a gradual.

msIdentifier.collection: John Frederick Lewis Collection of European Manuscripts

msItem.title: Initial B with St. Michael Archangel slaying the dragon
